item.title: Help with command [PI]

item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

ta1nt3d:

so should i change the member status in the code? i dont really see how that could change anything being that it requires 0 member status to use explain please what you mean?

means more than, therefore you need 1 or more memberstatus… its not rocket science mate.

item.title: Help with command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Veng;

Make sure your memberstatus is more than 0, I.E 1, 2, 3 etc… and make sure you are not inWild.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

ive done everything right and compiled without errors and my command still will not work
help would be really nice i added in the unmute and unipmute commands just to help you get insight on it
the mute commands work im trying to get the “veng” one to work

EDIT:here is the NEW code

[code=java]}
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“unipmute”)) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(9);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
Connection.unIPMuteUser(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
c.sendMessage("You have Un Ip-Muted the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName);
break;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
//c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
}
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“unmute”)) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7);
Connection.unMuteUser(playerToBan);
} catch(Exception e) {
//c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“veng”)) {
{
if (c.memberStatus == 0) {
{
if (!c.inWild())
{
try
{
c.getItems().addItem(9075, 10000);
c.getItems().addItem(560, 10000);
c.getItems().addItem(557, 10000);
c.sendMessage(“The Gods have blessed you with runes.”);
}
catch (Exception e)
{
System.out.println("Error occurred whilst doing the veng command, for: " + c.playerName);
}
}
else
{
c.sendMessage(“You cannot do this command whilst in the Wilderness!”);
}

			}

        }
    }
}	[/code]

Read full topic
